supreme 1.0.1
  • Reference
  • News

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

supreme 1.0.0 (2019-12-25)

  • Refactored the find_* calls

  • Improved graph facility: introduced shapes for different fields e.g. input, output, return

  • Made graphing more customizable: allowed to choose fields, styles etc.

  • Removed some src_* calls (kept only src_yaml() and src_file()) because they were too expensive to maintain given the scope of the project

  • Added new unit & integration tests; increased the overall code coverage

  • Improved the modeling language

supreme 0.2.1

  • Make the exported variables in R/globals.R options placed in R/zzz.R.

supreme 0.2.0 (2019-08-07)

  • Create example functions in the API for demonstration purposes, e.g. example_app_path().

  • Use nomnoml package for the graph() facility.

  • Implement reading functions for files (src_file()), packages (src_pkg()), environments (src_env()), expressions (src_expr()) and YAML objects (src_yaml()).

supreme 0.1.0 (2019-02-06)

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.

  • Package creation and initial work.

Contents

Developed by Metin Yazici.
